localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: - Get an emoji email address like you@🚀 - Choose from 250+ emoji domains - Forward email from your Mailoji to any email address - Use a Mailoji on your twitter, CV, website; anywhere - Stand out online with the most unique email addresses on the internet
blogPost.body: - Get an emoji email address like you@🚀 - Choose from 250+ emoji domains - Forward email from your Mailoji to any email address - Use a Mailoji on your twitter, CV, website; anywhere - Stand out online with the most unique email addresses on the internet
blogPost.title: Mailoji - Emoji email addresses for everyone
blogPost.author: Ben Stokes (Tiny Projects💡)

localize.description: - 获得一个像你一样的表情符号电子邮件地址@🚀 - 从250多个表情符号域中选择 - 从你的Mailoji转发电子邮件到任何电子邮件地址 - 在你的twitter、简历、网站上使用Mailoji；在任何地方 - 通过互联网上最独特的电子邮件地址脱颖而出。
localize.tagline: 每个人的表情符号电子邮件地址

localize.description: - 獲得一個像你一樣的表情符號電子郵件地址@🚀 - 從250多個表情符號域中選擇 - 從你的Mailoji轉發電子郵件到任何電子郵件地址 - 在你的twitter、簡歷、網站上使用Mailoji；在任何地方 - 通過互聯網上最獨特的電子郵件地址脫穎而出。
localize.tagline: 每個人的表情符號電子郵件地址

previous.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you don’t want to share in images you’re going to share anyway. Hide people’s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
previous.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets

localize.description: 分享你的图像，而不是你的秘密。黑色荧光笔让你可以轻松地隐藏你不想分享的图片中的文字。只需快速涂鸦，就能隐藏人们的姓名、电子邮件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的图像而不是你的秘密

localize.description: 分享你的圖像，而不是你的祕密。黑色熒光筆讓你可以輕鬆地隱藏你不想分享的圖片中的文字。只需快速塗鴉，就能隱藏人們的姓名、電子郵件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的圖像而不是你的祕密

next.excerpt: Because everyone want to be a part of Clubhouse and there are lot's of scammers everywhere we've decided to organize a Free Invite exchange chain. You get one invite, you share two with others.
next.title: Clubhouse Invite Bot - Get one invite free, share two with others

localize.description: 因为每个人都想成为Clubhouse的一员，而到处都有很多骗子，所以我们决定组织一个免费的邀请函交换链。你得到一个邀请，你就可以和别人分享两个邀请。
localize.tagline: 免费获得一个邀请，与他人分享两个邀请

localize.description: 因爲每個人都想成爲Clubhouse的一員，而到處都有很多騙子，所以我們決定組織一個免費的邀請函交換鏈。你得到一個邀請，你就可以和別人分享兩個邀請。
localize.tagline: 免費獲得一個邀請，與他人分享兩個邀請
